Articles.Content: Ah Cristen this ground virginia! \*smashes a whiskey bottle on the hill\*

I move the hill outside of the national park and I push you off of it.

My ordinary hill.

I take a bunch of goats with gatling guns strapped to their sides, and kill you, and take the hill.

My hill with a bunch of gatling gun armed goats.

I had Washington leading the militia personally to end the rebellion.

Government's hill (George Washington is a US president!).
I assassinate your president and claim the hill. MY HILL MUHAHA

I destroy your evil lair (for you must have one in order to laugh like that) and plant the KSP flag on the hill!

My Kerbally hill!

A helicopter-mounted laser burns the flag to crisps, since that's all you left there.

My helicopter-mounted laser defended hill w/ crisps.

i destroy your helicopter using satellites to redirecting and magnifying sunbeams to the helicopters exact location.

My toasted hill.

I erode a mountain down to a hill.

My hill.

While onboard the ISS I beamed a laser light to a satellite, but for some reason killed you in the process...

No one's hill.

I still have my toasted hill. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

It now is a rock monster when it gets angry. (hint it gets angry when someone tries to take it)

My time machine breaks down far in the future (present for everyone else) and I find that I am dead and the hill is no longer mine. I then devise a strategy to avoid the fate that I have witnessed. I go steel a time machine from an alternate me from who-knows-when and I go back in time to execute my plan. Many years later (present for everyone else) I emerge from a secret bunker to see a world that is much different then the one I saw previously, I then go and claim the abandoned hill. I then realize that I have created a few temporal paradoxes and I polluted the space time continuum or some quantum nonsense like that... Not my problem.

My hill.

After watching you get snapped in two by a horrifying rock monster, I stab it in the eye and it curls up, crying. I plant a flag in it and have a proud face.

My crying rock monster that happens to also be a hill.
I manage to persuade you to give me the hill .

The zombies are coming...

![DISCOSUMMON.png](http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140329154002/plantsvszombies/images/d/d7/DISCOSUMMON.png)

Dance zombies!

My hill.

I turn off the music and the zombies shuffle away, disappointed.

My hill!

I have backup... err bull cannon...

![Zombot_War_Wagon.png](http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140213113220/plantsvszombies/images/f/f5/Zombot_War_Wagon.png)

Maximus's robo-bull-infested hill.

I accidentally run into you with my warp drive shoes.

My hill.

I stick you in a cannon and fire you off the hill.

Yay. My hill.

press\* the hill is now reset back to the state in which i last posted. then i place a giant rock monster hydra on the hill that looks like a rock when someones not taking the hill. then watch as it eats you.

my hill for a change on and the hydra is saved now

"Graveeeeees..."

![IMG_0375.jpg](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YVz5-vsp6OQ/UvXThnJXESI/AAAAAAABE_g/Uc0is4RL02A/s1600/IMG_0375.jpg)

Starwhip's gravestone-infested hill.

I remove your hill. With an aircraft carrier. Which replaces said hill.

My aircraft carrier.

I dump billions of tons of dirt and rock on your aircraft carrier, creating a new continent with a single hill on it.

My new hill.

I bombed... er nuked your hill.

![hqdefault.jpg](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/vQqA9Awyt0w/hqdefault.jpg)

My hill.

The debris of the old hill creates a new hill somewhere else, and fortunately I was in town buying the supplies to make devious devices when the hill was nuked. I take over the new hill.

My new hill.
